verses.name: Nehemiah 7:14
verses.text: The children of Zaccai, seven hundred and threescore.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:15
verses.text: The children of Binnui, six hundred forty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:16
verses.text: The children of Bebai, six hundred twenty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:17
verses.text: The children of Azgad, two thousand three hundred twenty and two.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:18
verses.text: The children of Adonikam, six hundred threescore and seven.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:19
verses.text: The children of Bigvai, two thousand threescore and seven.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:20
verses.text: The children of Adin, six hundred fifty and five.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:21
verses.text: The children of Ater of Hezekiah, ninety and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:22
verses.text: The children of Hashum, three hundred twenty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:23
verses.text: The children of Bezai, three hundred twenty and four.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:24
verses.text: The children of Hariph, an hundred and twelve.
